mapper.select: SELECT CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY e.hiredate) AS SIGNED) AS idx, e.emp_id, e.emp_name, d.emp_dept_name, e.hiredate, COALESCE( (SELECT f.ori_file_name FROM file f WHERE f.file_kind = 5 AND e.emp_id = f.file_kind_idx), 'default' ) AS ori_file_name, COALESCE( (SELECT f.new_file_name FROM file f WHERE f.file_kind = 5 AND e.emp_id = f.file_kind_idx), 'default' ) AS new_file_name, COALESCE((SELECT SUM(ev.add_hour) FROM emp_vacation ev WHERE ev.emp_id = e.emp_id), 0) AS totalhour, COALESCE((SELECT SUM(vh.use_hour) FROM vacation_history vh WHERE vh.emp_id = e.emp_id), 0) AS usehour, (COALESCE((SELECT SUM(ev.add_hour) FROM emp_vacation ev WHERE ev.emp_id = e.emp_id), 0) - COALESCE((SELECT SUM(vh.use_hour) FROM vacation_history vh WHERE vh.emp_id = e.emp_id), 0)) AS remainhour FROM employee e JOIN department d ON e.emp_dept_idx = d.emp_dept_idx WHERE emp_id NOT IN ('master') ORDER BY idx desc;
